name: Every Item Matters
description:
You fell down a well and can't get back up. Fortunately for you it looks like something is down here. 

A hidden city? A lost Ruin? A secret alien base?  Or maybe you just hit your head and you are hallucinating.

To survive you need to find your way out. And every item you find will be a valuable ally to do just that.  Is naming them crazy? Maybe... But without them you will die!

Welcome to Every Item Matters a game where all the items you find will be necessary to solve harder and harder puzzles. Can you solve all the puzzles and escape?
